NAME: Sumitra Bagchi
ABOUT:
I am Women Techmaker Ambassador and Co-organizer of Google Developer Group Cloud (GDG Cloud) Community Kolkata and Google Facilitator for Cloud Study Jam 2019.

I got awarded in Popular Choice Category in World wide Spiceworks Challenge held on year 2015, I have been awarded at Flir Camera Challenge in a category of Honourable Mention and also got awarded for Microsoft Office 365 Challenge.

I have done Technical review of two books published by Apress, USA
1. Beginning for Platino Game Engine 
2. Leap Motion for Developers

I am a Udemy Premium Instructor and published Video Tutorials on Udemy for PHP Students. The name of the tutorials is "PHP Interview Questions and Solutions - Part 1" and I am working for 2nd part of the Tutorials where I have concentrated for MySQL and MySQLi. Already more than 1000 Students has enrolled for my course.

I have an academic degree of "Master in Computer Application" and I have a total experience of 10 years as a Web Developer. First 4 years I had worked in an Web Development industry and since last 6 years I am working as a Freelancer. In my total PHP career I have done several projects on Web Development using PHP, CakePHP, MySQl and advance verson of PHP like PHP7, MySQLi and also I have done several projects using C# and Python.

PROJECTS TAKEN.Description: I used CakePHP 2.0, MySQL as backend and HTML as front end. This websites is related to various Home Decor collection. Admin can add, edit and delete as per their requirement from the admin panel. Customer can select his product and request online for a quote for the same. After that Admin will send unique password to his registered email id and customer can view all the products in the Buyers Zone, else customer can view only few products.

I used Cake PHP 2.0 and MySQL as backend and HTML 5.0 as frontend for this project. This websites contents different Manufacturer and their different Brands. If we enter into the brands details it will show the Chemical Composition and Health Effects Information and Hazard Statements of the same. Admin can add, edit, upload all the details related Manufacturer and Brands from the Admin Portal.

It is a Multi Lingual Website. It will open in 8 others languages along with English.
